Coordination of Benefits (COB) The patient is not the subscriber; payers are commercial health insurance companies. 

Example 2.A. - Coordination of Benefits (COB). The patient is not the subscriber. VAN submits claim on behalf of billing provider to Payer A. Payer A adjudicated the claim and transmits an 835 to the billing provider. The VAN then submits a second claim on behalf of the billing provider to Payer B (receiver).

ISA*00*..........*01*SECRET....*ZZ*SUBMITTERS.ID..*ZZ*RECEIVERS.ID...*030101*1253*^*00501*000000905*1*T*:~
GS*HC*SENDER CODE*RECEIVER CODE*19991231*0802*1*X*005010X224A1~
